free: #e There was a child.
#c 有一個小孩子。
#e And then that child took a frog.
#c 然後他拿了一隻青蛙。
#e And then he liked to play that (frog).
#c 然後他很喜歡玩那隻(青蛙)。
#n sia-vava 引伸出觀賞或把玩的意思
#n dirugnu 瓶子
#n dirugnu 瓶子
#e There was a transparent bottle.
#c 有個很透明的玻璃小瓶子。
#n kalas 玻璃
#e They two were watching that.
#c 他們兩個在欣賞它。
#e And then his dog liked that.
#c 然後他的小狗很喜歡它。
#e He shook and watched (the frog).
#c 他搖一搖而且望著(青蛙)。
#e And then when the child was tired, he went to bed.
#c 當那個小孩累的時候，就睡覺了。
#e When the child was sleeping, the frog jumped out.
#c 當那個小孩在睡覺的時候，這隻青蛙就跳出來了。
#n ituku跳
#e That frog is very good (at something).
#c 青蛙很厲害
#e No matter how small the bottle is, the frog jumped up and down, and finally ran away from the uncovered bottle mouth.
#c 不管瓶子有多小，青蛙跳得很厲害，跳來跳去，然後就從沒有蓋起來的小洞跳跑了。
#e The child got up.
#c 小孩就起來了。
#e And (the child) was surprised and said, “Why was there no frog?”
#c (小孩)很驚訝地說：「青蛙怎麼會不見了？」

gloss: 名物化-重疊-睡-名物化-3SG.屬格
free: #e And then (he) kept looking at the bottle from his bed in this way.
#c 然後就像這樣，小孩一直從床鋪上看著瓶子
#e That girl asked where the frog has gone.
#c 那個女生說青蛙去哪裡呢？
#e I don’t know whether (the child) is male or female
#c 我不知道(小孩)是男生還是女生呢
#n 這是發音老師自己的自問
#e When he came down from the bed, he thought that (the frog) might be inside the shoes.
#c 當他從床鋪下來，想說(青蛙)可能在鞋子裡
#e And he held the long, thick rubbers and looked down into them. And then he went inside the hole.
#c 他拿起又高又厚的雨鞋往裡面看下去，然後就進了那個洞。
#n lapa(pu)bebe-belenge往上看
#e But there was nothing.
#c 可是沒有啊。
#e And then his dog went into that bottle immoderately.
#c 然後他的狗變本加厲地進去了那個瓶子。
#n 再請老師舉一些 pasidruadrua的用法。
#e (The dog) entered the bottle, smelled it and went into the big bottle.
#c (那隻狗)進到那個大瓶子裡，聞了聞。

gloss: 名物化-方式-重疊-呈現¬-名物化

free: #e The bottle’s shape was like the glass (bottle).
#c 那個瓶子的樣子像是玻璃瓶。
#e How about the dog?
#c 那狗呢?
#e When (he) did this, how could it be the dog?
#c 當他這麼做的時候，怎麼會是這隻狗呢？
#e (He) took it up and ate.
#c (他)拿起來吃。
#e (He) said this surprisingly and then held the dog angrily.
#c 然後很驚訝地說著，然後就生氣地抱著那隻狗。
#e “Is it you that take it?” And then (he) said.
#c 然後他說：「是你拿的嗎？」
#e “Is it you that eat?” He scolded and asked.
#c 他用責備的語氣問說：「是不是你吃的？」
#e Is it that dog, or the child?
#c 是那隻狗嗎？還是小孩？
#e The dog kept barking, “Where did he go?”
#c 那狗一直叫：「他去哪裡呢？」
#e (He) said, “Where did the frog go?”
#c (他)說：「青蛙去哪了？」
#e When he said so, then the dog followed and barked.
#c 當他說這樣時，然後狗就跟著叫。
#e When (the dog) was barking in this way, indicating that there was one hornet in a tree.
#c 當(狗)這樣叫時，說著樹上有一隻虎頭蜂。
#e From his voice, two kinds of voice, the hornet came out and flied.
#c 從聲音出來，有兩種聲音，虎頭蜂飛出來了
#e The dog which was under the hornets was shocked (by the sound of the hornets.)
#c 在虎頭蜂下面的狗，因為受到(虎頭蜂)聲音的驚嚇，往上吠。
#e That child looked at the hornets along the hole.
#c 那小孩沿著洞往虎頭蜂所在處瞧。
#e The child was surprised.
#c 這個小孩很驚訝。
#e The dog was barking and light rubbing (against the tree).
#c 那隻狗一直吠並且(靠著樹)磨蹭。
#n ma-la-bungubungu nakuane 不要煩我
#e What’s hanged in the tree?
#c 什麼吊在樹上?
#e The dog went to the trunk where the hornets live and scratched the trunk.
#c 這隻狗到這顆虎頭蜂居住的樹旁抓刨著樹幹。
#n presidential building=tangadrane
